'use strict';

var traverse = module.exports = function (schema, opts, cb) {
  // Legacy support for v0.3.1 and earlier.
  if (typeof opts == 'function') {
    cb = opts;
    opts = {};
  }

  cb = opts.cb || cb;
  var pre = (typeof cb == 'function') ? cb : cb.pre || function() {};
  var post = cb.post || function() {};
